document.full_text: iphone maker foxconn technology group is considering investing $12 billion in brazil, a move that could help apple inc and other tech companies expand in the world's eighth largest economy.
document.title: apple iphone-maker foxconn ponders big brazil move
lines_and_colors: iphone maker foxconn technology group is considering investing $12 billion in brazil, a move that could help apple inc and other tech companies expand in the world's eighth largest economy.
